CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS(Email,".edu"), "Education", IF( OR( CONTAINS(Email,"@gmail.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@hotmail."), CONTAINS(Email,"@aol.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@msn.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@wanadoo.fr"), CONTAINS(Email,"@orange.fr"), CONTAINS(Email,"@mac.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@live.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@comcast.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@rediffmail.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@free.fr"), CONTAINS(Email,"@gmx.de"), CONTAINS(Email,"@gmx.co.uk"), CONTAINS(Email,"@web.de"), CONTAINS(Email,"@yandex.ru"), CONTAINS(Email,"@ymail.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@libero.it"), CONTAINS(Email,"@outlook.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@uol.com.br"), CONTAINS(Email,"@bol.com.br"), CONTAINS(Email,"@mail.ru"), CONTAINS(Email,"@cox.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@sbcglobal.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@sfr.fr"), CONTAINS(Email,"@verizon.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@googlemail.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@ig.com.br"), CONTAINS(Email,"@bigpond.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@terra.com.br"), CONTAINS(Email,"@neuf.fr"), CONTAINS(Email,"@alice.it"), CONTAINS(Email,"@rocketmail.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@att.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@laposte.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@facebook.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@bellsouth.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@charter.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@yahoo."), CONTAINS(Email,"@rambler.ru"), CONTAINS(Email,"@tiscali.it"), CONTAINS(Email,"@shaw.ca"), CONTAINS(Email,"@sky.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@earthlink.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@optonline.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@freenet.de"), CONTAINS(Email,"@t-online.de"), CONTAINS(Email,"@aliceadsl.fr"), CONTAINS(Email,"@virgilio.it"), CONTAINS(Email,"@home.nl"), CONTAINS(Email,"@qq.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@telenet.be"), CONTAINS(Email,"@me.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@tiscali.co.uk"), CONTAINS(Email,"@voila.fr"), CONTAINS(Email,"@gmx.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@mail.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@ntlworld.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@arcor.de"), CONTAINS(Email,"@frontiernet.net"), CONTAINS(Email,"@hetnet.nl"), CONTAINS(Email,"@zonnet.nl"), CONTAINS(Email,"@club-internet.fr"), CONTAINS(Email,"@juno.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@optusnet.com.au"), CONTAINS(Email,"@blueyonder.co.uk"), CONTAINS(Email,"@icloud.com"), CONTAINS(Email,"@duck.com") ), "Personal", "Corporate" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Equal to "Education" if the email address ends in .edu; equal to "Personal" if the email address domain matches one of the top 90 most popular personal email provider domains. Otherwise, equal to "Corporate"
CustomField.label: Email Type
